lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk scored his second goal of the game in overtime, giving Russia its first title at the world championship since 1993 with a 5-4 win over Canada in Quebec City.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk scored his second goal of the game in overtime, giving Russia its first title at the world championship since 1993 with a 5-4 win over Canada in Quebec City.
